Name: Anita's Attitude Adjuster
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first seven ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne and gently stir.
Review: Anita has a problem - she's indecisive when it comes to choosing base spirits.
Nutrition: One serving of Anita's Attitude Adjuster contains 217 calories
